titles.title: Designating Majority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Mr. Armey asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/29/1997--Introduced. Elects the following Representatives to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct: (1) Lamar S. Smith; (2) Joel Hefley; (3) Bob Goodlatte; and (4) Joe Knollenberg.
